ygData.subject: Survey Results
ygData.msgSnippet: Gentlemen and ladies, The final recommendation from warriors_eq@onelist.com (128 members) is two enhancements for the warrior class: 1) Increase the cap on
ygData.messageBody:
Gentlemen and ladies,

The final recommendation from warriors_eq@onelist.com (128 members) is two
enhancements for the warrior class:

1) Increase the cap on combat abilities (1H slashing, 2H slashing, dodge,
parry, riposte, dual wield, double attack) from 200 to 255.

2) Allow weapon skill specialization along the same lines as magic users.
This would allow a warrior to specialize in one type of weapon for reduced
delay and increased damage.

Please include this as feedback every night for the next few weeks while you
play the game. Post it on any and all message boards you can find and pass
it on to your friends. Letï¿½s send the same message to Verant, if they see a
large number of people with the same suggested improvements they may just
make it happen.


For the Honor and or May the blessings of
Glory of Rallos Zek; Tunare be with you;

Patty of Halas Patty Treehugger
Barbarian Warrior Princess Half Elf Ranger
username: Patricia username: Patty
server: Bristlebane server: Bristlebane
